ValidationRule.description: Require CPA Funds Paid when CPA Indicator is filled in
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(CPA_Indicator__c) <> null, TEXT(CPA_Indicator__c) <> 'Opt-in - Funds exhausted', TEXT(CPA_Indicator__c) <> 'Opt-out - Refused', TEXT(CPA_Indicator__c) <> 'Opt-out - Member not Enrolled', TEXT(CPA_Indicator__c) <> 'Opt-in - Reimbursement not Confirmed', ISNULL(CPA_Funds_Paid__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CPA Funds Paid required when CPA Indicator is filled in
